Bellevue.Glenn L. Martin Bomber Plant:
The Glenn L. Martin Bomber Plant (also known as Air Force Plant 1) was a facility located adjacent to Offutt Field near Omaha, and lies adjacent to Bellevue in Sarpy County, Nebraska. It was operational from 1942 to 1945.


== Background ==
In 1940 as American involvement in World War II loomed, the United States Army Air Corps chose Offutt Field as the site for a new bomber plant that was to be operated by the Glenn L. Martin Company.
